Articles.Content:
This thread is for my WIP KSP film. Fittingly named "Lazarus"

This has been in the works for about 6 months now... Although I had to completely restart from scratch last week due to a problem with my PC.

VEHICLE SUBMISSIONS NEEDED

I will be posting updates on development and teasers.

Ground Vehicle as well as atmospheric vehicles are needed.

Ideas for the movie are appreciated as well.

RULES FOR SUBMISSIONS:

1. State what team you want your vehicle to be on (Good or bad)

2. Must Use BDarmory

3. Max part count of 350

4. Be as realistic as possible.

5. No space fighters/carriers (For now)

Thank you

-JID00gaming
Wouldn't it be cool to have a massive extra planetary launchpads equipped carrier?

Wouldn't it be cool to have a massive extra planetary launchpads equipped carrier?
It would, but it is going to be a cinematic, so there is no point. Cinematic as in (Im aloud to use hyperedit) XD

Ground Vehicle as well as atmospheric vehicles are needed.

I have a little craft that may be worth submitting. It's a short-range VTOL with wicked maneuverability, a tiny profile, a low part count, and some reasonably nice aesthetics. While I don't have BDArmory installed, I could easily imagine having a gun or two mounted on it... it is, after all, capable of carrying its weight in spare parts or ferrying weaponized things around

Here's an image. I'll provide the .craft in a bit if you're interested.

That being said:

Ideas for the movie are appreciated as well.

I could give you much better suggestions if you actually said what the video was about. Aside from the somewhat cryptic title, I have no idea whether this is about zombies/Kerbal-Jesus (2.2b! 2.2b!), which is what I normally think of when I think of a project named "Lazarus." Presumably, if you've been working on this for months, you'd have a solid plot, a cast of characters, and an idea for where this film would take place. I'd be happy enough to give some constructive criticism if I knew a bit more about this project... if you want to keep the info secret, you could just send me a PM, but I don't think there's much of a reason to.

Best of luck with this!

-Upsilon

I have a little craft that may be worth submitting. It's a short-range VTOL with wicked maneuverability, a tiny profile, a low part count, and some reasonably nice aesthetics. Presumably, if you've been working on this for months, you'd have a solid plot, a cast of characters, and an idea for where this film would take place. I'd be happy enough to give some constructive criticism if I knew a bit more about this project... if you want to keep the info secret, you could just send me a PM, but I don't think there's much of a reason to.

Best of luck with this!

-Upsilon

Thanks man! and yeah this little guy looks cool, im in

CURRENT MAP OF KERBIN

USF= Good (United Space Fleet)

KPD= Good (Kerbin Planetary Defence)

KMF= BAD (Kerbal Militia Forces)
